mapper.insert: insert into T_TRADE () values (#{id}, #{venderId}, #{skuId}, #{wareId}, #{supplierId}, #{num}, #{marketDay}, #{remark}, 1, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(NUM) FROM T_TRADE WHERE MARKET_DAY = #{marketDay}
SELECT COUNT(T.VENDER_ID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT VENDER_ID FROM T_TRADE WHERE MARKET_DAY = #{marketDay}) T

SELECT D.NUM,D.VENDER_ID,D.MARKET_DAY FROM (SELECT SUM(T.NUM) NUM, T.VENDER_ID, T.MARKET_DAY FROM T_TRADE T WHERE T.MARKET_DAY = #{marketDay} GROUP BY T.VENDER_ID) D ORDER BY D.NUM DESC LIMIT #{indexNum},#{pageSize}
